title: How Many Calories in a Domino's Pizza Slice?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Domino's pizza slice, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and variations for different styles and toppings.
h1: How Many Calories in a Domino's Pizza Slice?
assumptions: Medium hand-tossed crust cheese pizza slice (~1/8 of a 12-inch pizza); standard cheese and sauce, no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pizza size, crust type, toppings, location, and preparation. Check Domino's app or site for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard Domino's cheese pizza slice has about 220 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Domino's cheese pizza slice?
faqs.a: Approximately 220 kcal for a medium hand-tossed slice.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Domino's pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 26 g carbs, 9 g protein, 9 g fat per standard cheese slice.

faqs.q: Does crust type affect calories in Domino's pizza?
faqs.a: Yes—thin crust reduces by ~30 kcal, deep dish adds ~50 kcal per slice.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Domino's pizza slice?
faqs.a: Around 500 mg per cheese slice, higher with meat toppings.

faqs.q: Are Domino's calories the same for all pizza sizes?
faqs.a: No—large slices have more calories (~280 kcal) than medium (~220 kcal).
